name: Brownfield Land
description: A set of brownfield land records collected from 350+ local authorities.

name: Local plans
description: A collection of data about each local authorities local plans.

name: Development plan documents
description: A collection of all the development documents local authorities publish. We currently collect these for Buckinghamshire,  Lambeth and Southwark.

name: Development plan types
description: A list of the different types of development plans.

name: Brownfield sites
description: A collection of geographies that are Brownfield land sites. We currently have ~2500.

name: Development policies
description: A collection of the policies contained in the development plan documents we know about.

name: Development policy categories
description: A list of categories used to categorise development policies.

name: Permitted development right
description: Permitted development rights from the legislation.

name: Article 4 directions
description: The start of a collection of article 4 directions collected from publishing local authorities.

name: Conservation areas
description: A collection of conservation areas collected from local authorities.

name: Developer agreement type
description: A list of the different developer agreement types, e.g. Section 106

name: Contribution purpose
description: A list of allowable purposes for developer contributions.

name: Contribution funding status
description: A list of statuses to mark developer contribution transactions with. E.g. received or spent

name: Planning permission type
description: A list of permission types given to brownfield land sites.

name: Planning permission status
description: A list of planning permissions statuses given to brownfield land sites.

name: Ownership status
description: The list of ownership statuses given to brownfield land sites.

name: Local authority district
description: A collection of geogrpahies that represent the area each local authority covers.

name: Organisations
description: A collection of central and local government organisations who produce planning related data.

name: Developer agreements
description: A collection of developer agreement data collect from the local authorities who publish the data.
